documents.document: @TwiSparkPhil @unvarnishedvoid SOME people in university education are like that. I certainly wasn't.
@TryNotToDiePls @unvarnishedvoid @TwiSparkPhil Well, your crowd certainly is not.
@TwiSparkPhil @unvarnishedvoid You two were insulting my intelligence. Anyway....
@unvarnishedvoid Actually, I've plenty of interactions with people who think like you. Patterns emerge....
@TwiSparkPhil @unvarnishedvoid So, now you're assuming that I'm "arrogant." Take a number, join the queue and grab a cup of coffee.
@unvarnishedvoid Like what you lot do on a constant basis? AHAHAHAHAH.
@TwiSparkPhil @unvarnishedvoid So what exactly are you lot doing then?
@unvarnishedvoid Yaaaaaaaawn. I'm not the one projecting shit onto other people.
@unvarnishedvoid @TwiSparkPhil So you resent people who are better educated than you? Okay....
@unvarnishedvoid @EgglordDaNos4A2 Just saying, but people on YOUR side have subjected me to all sorts of racist abuse or "ableist" abuse.
@unvarnishedvoid LOLOLOL. Arbitrarily assuming that I'm "losing", despite your side's penchant for baseless assumptions is hilarious.
@AnthonyBuccill Actually, the amount of people dying as a result of terrorism in Europe has decreased significantly since the 1970s.
@EgglordDaNos4A2 @unvarnishedvoid Buddy, I'm of mixed racial heritage. I've been subject to PLENTY of racism by people on your side.
@unvarnishedvoid @TwiSparkPhil Oops! I have 2 degrees, including an MA in English. Trying to attack me on that level does not work.
@EgglordDaNos4A2 @unvarnishedvoid Hold up. I'm mixed-race, and I know someone who has a disability. Oops. Nice theory, please pick another.
@JPStarkiller201 Every media outlet "lies" on some level. Breitbart, Info Wars, Drudge Report and Prison Planet do the same thing.
@unvarnishedvoid Do you not know how to spell? And there you were trying to insult my intelligence. Better luck next time, doll.
@EgglordDaNos4A2 @unvarnishedvoid What bigotry?
@AnthonyBuccill Americans are more likely to die from a car crash than they are likely to die because of terrorism.
@TwiSparkPhil Here we go. Here are some examples. https://t.co/qShO6qwjLO https://t.co/FRdMsXvctc https://t.co/ut0HnXo4fN
@unvarnishedvoid People like you really aren't in the position to insult people based on their intelligence. Sorry.
@TwiSparkPhil @unvarnishedvoid What are you retards going to do? Send people to my house?
@unvarnishedvoid @EgglordDaNos4A2 You have no argument. The best that you clowns do is insulting people. Yawn.
@unvarnishedvoid Do you accept that anybody can potentially commit crimes?
@EgglordDaNos4A2 @unvarnishedvoid I'm sure her kids must be so proud to have a bigot as a mother. So proud.
@JPStarkiller201 Do you think that sites like Breitbart are trustworthy? That's like sawing off your leg if you have a toothache!
@unvarnishedvoid So, you're calling me retarded despite the fact that you fit the description better? Go 💩 in your hands and 👏👏👏👏.
@JPStarkiller201 He's about $990 million in debt (at least) to a coterie of banks in China, Germany, Russia and other countries!
@unvarnishedvoid "Mass immigration causes crime increase." Because only migrants can be criminals?
@EgglordDaNos4A2 Actually, like you, @unvarnishedvoid is hiding behind a fake name. So it'd be impossible to define his/her/its gender.
@TwiSparkPhil @unvarnishedvoid What utter tripe.
@unvarnishedvoid So you don't accept that pedophilia isn't based religion?
@unvarnishedvoid So now you think that all criminals are Muslims? 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣
@AnthonyBuccill There's a difference between "doing his job" and discriminating against people based on their religion and place of origin.
@JPStarkiller201 The trade deal with China, for example was in existence since the 1970s. And it was originally ratified by Nixon. Anyway...
@EgglordDaNos4A2 I wasn't attacking him. It was a simple observation. There IS a difference.
@unvarnishedvoid LOL. How am I reaching, moron?

He's gone too far. #StandUpToTrump
@timthejarhead @KarenDoe50 There are other examples of people who need medical treatment being denied entry to the US though.
@EveLaurence Yep. I went to protest Trump's "Muslim Ban" by myself. Which was fun.
@AnthonyBuccill He said "Ban Muslims from the US until we figure out what the hell is going on!" during his campaign. The hell do you think?
@timthejarhead @KarenDoe50 https://t.co/8COWlNWWB6 As much as I normally don't like the Daily Mail, the story is absolutely sickening.
@unvarnishedvoid Jesus Christ. You don't have to be Muslim to be a pedophile. Unless you think that Fritzl was a Muslim!
@BigJoe570 "and there's the proof that you don't follow the whole news." That's a big claim coming from someone like you.
@BigJoe570 You do realise that a lot of people who support Trump have no desire to better themselves? Read Hillbilly Elegy by @JDVance1.
@KarenDoe50 That's because you're a sociopath. By the way, a 1-year old child with cancer was just denied entry to the US. Good job! 👏👏👏👏👏
@washingtonpost Imagine being so filled with hate that you would let innocent children die? This is insanity....
@BigJoe570 Who says I'm "listening to CNN"? Why don't you stop trying to attack me because I don't exclusively follow right wing sites?
@KarenDoe50 "We? It's not up to you...lol." Funny. Seeing as someone flying to the US from Dublin airport was turned away today. Piss off.
@BigJoe570 What limited resources? Unemployment is at 4.7%. There are more jobs in America than there were 8 years ago.
@BigJoe570 Are you serious? Trump plans to make things worse for everyone in the US. Repealing the ACA would deprive people of healthcare.
Say NO to the agenda of hatred that's currently peddled by @realDonaldTrump. We'll start by saying no to #Sessions
Fuck him. #Sessions
@BigJoe570 Bullshit. Your lot are quite good at either creating problems from nothing or making a bad situation worse.
@BigJoe570 We ARE taking in refugees. Don't think your lot is as familiar with the good that other countries are doing, I'm sorry to say.
#NP @kreator - Gods of Violence
@BigJoe570 There are plenty of "Bad Actors" on your side, far more than the number who are refugees.
@BigJoe570 How would you like it if YOUR family was caught in an active warzone and had to seek asylum somewhere else?
@BigJoe570 You do realise that Trump doesn't give a damn about any of the things you've listed? Repealing the ACA is but one example.
@BigJoe570 So you're justifying it?
@BigJoe570 Did I say that? By the way, Ireland has done more than the US to help.
@BigJoe570 Trump's plan makes them all the same. Hence the "indefinite" freeze on admitting refugees.
@BigJoe570 Look, if you demonise people then they'd (most likely) conform to those expectations. Like refugees.
@BigJoe570 So, you'd exclude the ones who want to integrate into society too?
@BigJoe570 "So called refugees"? The Paris attacks for example, were carried out by French nationals! Who just happened to be Muslims.
@BigJoe570 You're advocating committing an illegal act on the assumption that all refugees would commit illegal acts. It's a slippery slope.
@BigJoe570 There already WAS "vetting" in the US and elsewhere. All Trump has done is take it too far.
@BigJoe570 So, you're going to be "Judge, Jury and Executioner?"
@BigJoe570 Not all refugees are violent. In Ireland, for example, I'm far more likely to get attacked by another Irish national.
@NBCNews Wasn't Paul Ryan going to stand up to Trump? Or did his rat-like need for self preservation take over?
@BigJoe570 Trump thought that Obama didn't go far enough, so he took some incredibly unnecessary steps. That's not my fault.
@BigJoe570 You said that you'd "kill to defend", not me.
@BigJoe570 Trump is the President now. And it was HIS decision, not Obama's.
@BigJoe570 So you're advocating the murder of foreigners on the basis that they MIGHT commit crimes? What?
@BigJoe570 Most refugees are interested in (and capable of) integrating and being part of society.
@BigJoe570 The ban targets people from Muslim majority countries. Which is something that you haven't managed to understand.
@BigJoe570 Actually, you don't HAVE to be a refugee to rape and murder people. I'm sure you've "NEVER" done any of that.
@BigJoe570 PEGIDA are anti-immigrant. Trump seems to have been watching a lot of Lutz Bachmann's speeches. In addition to Tommy Robinson's.
@politico How was Sessions able to say that with a straight face?
@JPStarkiller201 Weren't you falsely accusing the left of throwing insults? #Hypocrite
@BigJoe570 @NBCNews Bissonnette's Facebook page. Also, white nationalism knows no borders. Like any other political ideology.
@JPStarkiller201 So, trying to create multiple trade wars will create jobs? In what universe would that help?
@JPStarkiller201 There are plenty of people on the far right who hurl insults at people. Really have no clue why you're virtue signalling!
@ChickenChaser I think that @BigJoe570 would probably not consider that as evidence.
@BigJoe570 Actually, white nationalism/supremacism is not unique to any one country. Ever heard of an organisation called PEGIDA?
@BigJoe570 Hang on. Political ideologies know no geographical boundaries. There's plenty of Irish people who stupidly support Trump.
@sjslaxdaddy Most of the jobs Trump wanted to bring back were unskilled manufacturing jobs. The majority of which are now automated. #Mong
@BigJoe570 @NBCNews Ah yes, because you think Breitbart is unbiased?
@JPStarkiller201 Look up what the word "sociopath" means. Trump has most of those characteristics.
@JPStarkiller201 So, you think that Breitbart is more trustworthy? Trump meets the criteria for being a sociopath.
